diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Solitary Fibrous Tumor of the Liver
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The final diagnosis of solitary fibrous tumor of the liver was strongly suggested after histopathologic analysis of the liver biopsy. Imaging findings including heterogeneous enhancement, low FDG uptake, and the absence of cirrhosis and central scar supported the benign nature of the tumor, while the clinical presentation and imaging contributed to the exclusion of other differential diagnoses.
